data.title: Nothing, Just Milind Soman And Ankita Konwar Redefining Couple Goals
meta_keywords: Milind Soman and Ankita Konwar anniversary
data.meta_description: Milind Soman and his wife Ankita arrived hand in hand to attend the Style Icons event.
data.text:
Milind Soman and his wife Ankita Konwar epitomise love and inspiration. The couple often captivates fans with their enchanting social media presence, from wanderlust adventures to romantic getaways. Recently, the lovebirds made a stunning appearance at an event. The video of the duo posing for the shutterbugs has surfaced on social media and fans are swooning over the glamorous couple.

In the video, we can see Milind and his wife Ankita arriving hand in hand to attend the Style Icons event. The couple, before making their way to the ceremony, was captured striking some stellar poses for the camera. Milind, in an all-black stylish ensemble, flaunted his quintessential beard look. To complement the dashing actor and model, his wife Ankita dressed in a monochrome co-ord set featuring a waistcoat and midi-length flared skirt. The duo flaunted a captivating smile and exuded joy and togetherness in the video.

Interestingly, Milind and Ankita celebrated six years of togetherness earlier in April. Known for taking some fitness themed breaks, the couple made no exception on their wedding anniversary and jetted off to Paris. In an unusual celebration, they marked the special day with a 42-km barefoot run during their vacation.

Milind even shared some hidden gems from their anniversary diaries on Instagram. The actor accompanied the post with the caption, “Paris- the city of love, before, after, and in between. One more marathon for Ankita Konwar and me, highly recommended, great weather, tough route, and French support now off to see the museums and more food !!!!! Have fun people.”

The pictures featured them enjoying their hearts out in front of the Eiffel Tower and the streets of the city of love. In one of the frames, the couple sealed their love with a passionate kiss dressed in their jerseys. A few slides ahead, we can also see Ankita pecking Milind on his cheek. The last slide showcased them kissing each other against the backdrop of the iconic Eiffel Tower.

Milind Soman and Ankita Konwar tied the knot in 2018. Previously, Milind was married to French actress Mylene Jampanoi. The duo separated in 2009.
